title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4212.10 - Agreements in connection with commercial revitalization projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4212.10 - Agreements in connection with commercial revitalization projects

State Regulations
(a) Eligible
recipients who receive program assistance in connection with commercial
revitalization projects shall execute a project agreement with the
corporation. (b) Property owners
and/or tenants who participate in commercial revitalization projects shall
execute a grant and disbursement agreement (on terms acceptable by corporation)
with the eligible recipient or the municipality if so designated by the
eligible recipient, which shall outline the terms and conditions pursuant to
which such grants are made. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4212.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
